chart_widget.widget.json: {"name":"ChartWidget","description":"Widget to display a chart from time series data","version":{"spec":"0.1.0"},"integration":{"type":"angular"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Title for the chart."}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Provide the data to display in another widget.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource","format":"topic"}}},"chart":{"type":"object","description":"Set options for the chart representation.","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["pieChart","stackedAreaChart","multiBarChart"],"default":"pieChart","description":"Type of the chart, excepted types are defined in external library NVD3."}}}}}}

default.theme.data_provider_widget.html: {{$index + 1}}. {{item.description}}

data_provider_widget.widget.json: {"name":"DataProviderWidget","description":"Widget that provides other widgets with data.","version":{"spec":"0.1.0"},"integration":{"type":"angular"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["data"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"List selection title"}}},"data":{"type":"object","required":["resource","items"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"ID of resource to publish."},"items":{"type":"array","description":"An array of data sets of which a user can choose one to be published.","minItems":1,"items":{"type":"object","required":["title","location"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"Title of the data set."},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Short description of the data set that is displayed below the title."},"location":{"type":"string","description":"URL to load the resource from when the submit button is pressed."}}}}}},"messages":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration of messages published via didEncounterError or didValidate events.","properties":{"i18nFailedLoadingResource":{"type":["object","string"],"description":"didEncounterError message to publish when a GET for a resource fails. [resource] is replaced by the actual name of the resource.","default":"Could not load resource \"[resource]\""}}}}}}

headline_widget.widget.json: {"name":"HeadlineWidget","description":"Displays a simple headline and an intro html text.","version":{"spec":"0.1.0"},"integration":{"type":"angular"},"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"headline":{"type":"object","description":"The HTML text to be shown as a headline.","properties":{"htmlText":{"type":"string","description":"The HTML headline content."},"level":{"type":"integer","description":"The hierarchical level of the headline (1 to 6).","minimum":1,"maximum":6,"default":1}}},"intro":{"type":"object","description":"Additional introductory HTML text to be shown below the headline.","properties":{"htmlText":{"type":"string","description":"The HTML intro content."}}}}}}

table_editor_widget.widget.json: {"name":"TableEditorWidget","description":"A widget that provides a spreadsheet-like content editor.","version":{"spec":"0.1.0"},"integration":{"type":"angular"},"controls":["laxar_uikit/controls/date_picker"],"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Editable table title"}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Shows the time series in an editable table.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource which should refer to a 2-dimensional array.","format":"topic"}}}}}}
